A Blog on a Reach

About me

Its always difficult to answer the question where I am from. I have been a drifter most of my life. My sisters and I followed my mother around the country while she persued her career in higher education. After high school I kept traveling for another five years both within the United States and abroad. Some where in there I met the women of my dreams and convinced her to marry me. We eventually settled down in a quaint little mountain town - Crested Butte, Colorado. After getting a B.A. in Enviromental Studies at Western State Colorado University, I jumped on the green building band wagon and learned how to build and remodel homes with Straw and Timber Craftsment. Our trademark was small high performance low/zero energy strawbale homes with custom natural finishes. I left the trade only after 5 years and moved to Denver, CO to learn software development and design at the Turing School

If you want more about my background check out my linkedin page. If you want to see what I am doing at Turing visit me on github
